update db_vibe_monitor.t_fault
fault_type_id = #{checkType},
editor_time = #{date},
photo = #{photo},
fault_desc = #{description},
person = #{person}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fa.id id ,fault_type_id checkType ,tdf.device_id deviceId ,devi.caption deviceName ,co.name typeStr , fa.person person , fault_desc description , editor_time date ,photo ,ta.state state ,us.name zhiPaiUserName from db_vibe_monitor.t_fault as fa left join db_vibe_monitor.t_task as ta on fa.id = ta.task_id left join db_vibe_basic.t_user as us on ta.executePerson = us.id left join db_vibe_basic.t_code as co on fa.fault_type_id = co.id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device_fault as tdf on fa.id = tdf.fault_id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device as devi on tdf.device_id = devi.id order BY fa.id DESC

select f.id ,f.fault_type_id checkType ,f.person ,f.fault_desc description ,f.editor_time date ,f.photo ,df.device_id deviceId ,devi.caption deviceName from db_vibe_monitor.t_fault f left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device_fault df on f.id=df.fault_id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device as devi on df.device_id = devi.id where f.id = #{id}

select fa.id id ,tdf.device_id deviceId ,devi.caption deviceName ,fault_type_id checkType ,co.name typeStr , person , fault_desc description , editor_time date ,photo ,state ,us.name zhiPaiUserName from db_vibe_monitor.t_fault as fa left join db_vibe_monitor.t_task as ta on fa.id = ta.task_id and state != 0 left join db_vibe_basic.t_user as us on ta.executePerson = us.id left join db_vibe_basic.t_code as co on fa.fault_type_id = co.id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device_fault as tdf on fa.id = tdf.fault_id left join db_vibe_monitor.t_device as devi on tdf.device_id = devi.id where us.name = #{username} order BY fa.id DESC
select count(*) from db_vibe_monitor.t_fault as fa,db_vibe_monitor.t_task as tm where fa.id = tm.task_id and state != 6 and tm.user_id = #{person}

select count(*) from db_vibe_monitor.t_fault as fa,db_vibe_monitor.t_task as tm where fa.id = tm.task_id and state = 6 and tm.user_id = #{person} and DATE_FORMAT( editor_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
